title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message:
hello. i have 820-2915 board. it doesn't have any visual damage. it doesn't have pp3v3_sus.PM_SLP_SUS_L  present. please advice me from where should i start? in SMC_BYPASS  mode it's started and presents PP3V3_SUS 3.3V!

PM_SLP_SUS_L    3.3V

PP3V3_SUS  -   0V     no short to ground

P3V3SUS_EN_L     3.3V

PPBUS_G3H is 12.58v   with/without battery on 85w charger

PM_BATLOW_L and SMC_BATLOW_L with and without battery have 0v

PP3V3_S5 -- 3.3V

title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message: how do you think is the PM_BATLOW_L problem?

title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message: no one can advice  me what should i check in this situation?

title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message:
"in SMC_BYPASS  mode it's started and presents PP3V3_SUS 3.3V"
Does it boot then, or just stays on without any activity?

Check AVREF_SMC voltage.

title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message:
yes its booted in smc bypass mode there is chime, apple logo, loading bar about 60% and than restart and same ....

AVREF_SMC  have 3.3v

title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message:
Then you have problems with some I/V sensor (pages 48 & 49).
Check ohm resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7000.

title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message:
resistance between pins 

17/18 is 3.6 ohm    and voltage is 12.57v for chgr_cso_n and same 12.57v on chgr_cso_p

 27/28 is 21.2 ohm      and voltage is 16.v for both chgr_csin/p

title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message:
during this state SMC_PBUS_VSENSE must be or not ?  there is 0v

SMC_DCIN_VSENSE have 2.7v

SMC_CPU_VSENSE   0v

SMC_GFX_VSENSE 0v

SMC_GPU_ISENSE 0v

SMC_GPU_VSENSE 0v

SMC_CPUVCCIO_ISENSE 0v

SMC_SA_ISENSE   0v

SMC_P1V5S3_ISENSE  0v

SMC_CPU_HI_ISENSE  0.6v


SMC_GPU_HI_ISENSE  0.68v

SMC_OTHER_HI_ISENSE  0.68v

SMC_BMON_ISENSE 0.05v

SMC_DCIN_ISENSE  0.2v


SMC_CPU_ISENSE  0v

SMC_GFX_ISENSE  0v

p.s during this testing i suddenly saw that green light wasn't on the charger. i checked ppbus_g3h and is only 0.9-1v.  tried detach and plug several times and nothing changed. still 1v. during this 2 days it happenes first time. but now still 1v

update: after several detach and plug now back to 12.58v

title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message:
Are you using 85W original Magsafe 1 charger?
Board still doesn't start with both charger and battery connected?

What said the client about how problem appeared?

title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message: yes i am using original 85w magsafe 1 charger. yes its not start even with both connected battery and charger.

title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message: i don't have another 85w original magsafe 1 charger. is there any method to check possibility of charger problem? can i test by multimeter on the motherboard if charger is not enough for anything ?

title: 820-2915 no pp3v3_sus
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 102367, member: 682"]
What said the client about how problem appeared?
[/QUOTE]
cleint said that his macbook not turning on. i left only macbook in office. not his charger
